name: Cosmic Crusade
description:
Blast your way to victory in the great Cosmic Crusade!
Saving the planet from the corporate titans isn't an easy job but someone has to do it, and preferably a skilled pilot. Have you got what it takes to be the best of the best?

Unlock ships and powerful attacks that have special abilities to aid you on your quest of destruction while climbing up the leaderboard!

(If you like this game sharing is greatly appreciated. If you have any questions please contact me via the moosepie.co.uk website)
